title: The unfortunate fencer; or, The couragious farmer of Gloucester-shire. Shewing how this huffing spark went down into those parts, challenging any one at all sorts of weapons; and at length shamefully conquer'd by a country farmer. To the tune of, The spinning wheel. Licensed according to order.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for P[hilip]. Brooksby, J[onah]. Deacon, J[osiah]. Blare, J[ohn]. Back,
